page.title: 18WALKINGTON,LOCAL GOVERNMENT.
page.content: THE PARISH COUNCIL OF 11 PERSONS IS ELECTED EVERY 3 YEARS TO LOOK AFTER VILLAGE AFFAIRS.IT HAS A CHAIRMAN,VICE CHAIRMAN AND A PAID CLERK,WHO IS NOT A MEMBER.IT ANSWERS TO THE BOROUGH AND COUNTY COUNCILS. THE PARISH COUNCIL FUNCTIONS TO LOOK AFTER THE FINANCE OF THE VILLAGE;GIVE APPROVAL TO DEVELOPMENT PLANS;AND CARE FOR LIGHTING,CLEANLINESS,AND GENERAL ATTRACTIVENESS OF THE PARISH. IT HAS 2 SUB_COMMITTEES;BUILDING AND CONSERVATION,THUS REFLECTING THE VITAL ISSUES REGARDING THE COMMUNITY. 72% OF THE VILLAGE ARE UNHAPPY OVER HOUSING PLANS,BUT THE COUNCIL BLAME LETHARGY AT ATTENDING PUBLIC MEETINGS, ALTHOUGH CRITICISING LATER. THE MINUTES OF THE COUNCIL MEETINGS ARE PUBLISHED IN THE NEWSLETTER BUT ARE SO ABBREVIATED THAT THEY ARE BARELY COMPREHENSIBLE.
